recipe.title: Tuna, Black-Eyed Pea and Radish Salad
ingredients: 1 6 1/8-ounce can solid white tuna, drained, flaked
1/2 cup chopped pitted brine-cured olives (such as Kalamata)
instructions: Whisk oil and lime juice in small bowl to blend. Season dressing to taste with cayenne, salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 3 hours ahead. Cover and let stand at room temperature.) Combine peas, tuna, radishes, cilantro, onion and olives in medium bowl. Toss with enough dressing to season to taste. Arrange lettuce on platter. Mound salad in center. Garnish with alternating slices of eggs and tomatoes.
